title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Mastery of Emergency Airway Management via Mobile Microlearning-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core steps of the emergency airway management protocol (assessment-planning-implementation-monitoring) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can perform intubation skills in a simulated environment that achieve a score of 4.0 or higher on the OSATS criteria.
Learners can improve decision-making accuracy by over 70% in real clinical scenarios using cognitive load management strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
